overview: When Ravi (Mithun Chakraborty) saves the life of the beautiful and mute Chandni (Zeenat Aman), the two fall in love but are soon separated. Years later, Ravi's wife unwittingly hires Chandni, sparking a series of events that could destroy them all. Directed by Vinod Dewan, this remarkable drama also features Madan Puri, Shakti Kapoor, G. Asrani and Ashalata.
title: Yaadon Ki Kasam
